description: 2300以上の金融サービスと連携するクラウド会計・経費精算・給与計算・勤怠管理など12のバックオフィスSaaSを提供。個人向け家計簿アプリ「マネーフォワード ME」も運営。AIによる自動仕訳機能を搭載し全国44000超の士業事務所が利用。Go言語やグローバル開発体制で技術力も高くFintech領域にも積極展開。2024年には複数のM&Aで事業領域を拡大。
description_en: Provides 12 back-office SaaS products including cloud accounting, expense management, payroll, and attendance management, connecting with over 2,300 financial services. Also operates personal budgeting app "Money Forward ME." Features AI-powered automatic journal entry used by over 44,000 professional firms nationwide. Strong technical capabilities with Go language and global development structure, actively expanding in Fintech. Expanded business domains through multiple M&As in 2024.
